text: @realDonaldTrump You might have dodged the impeachment bullet, Oompa-Loompa-in-chief, but Covid-19 doesn't care how many senators and foreign leaders you have in your back pocket. It can't be bribed, or blackmailed, or threatened, or fired. You talk about being God's chosen one? This is judgment.
